title: Decline v12 (Source Out)
content:
Commander Keen Decline v12

[url=http://alex.spatang.com/KeenDeclineV12.zip]Download Keen Decline v12[/url]

[url=http://alex.spatang.com/KFallSource.zip]Download Source[/url]

[img]http://img501.imageshack.us/img501/6430/sshot0tr.jpg[/img]

New Features
* New Hazzard
* Proper Score Board
* Ability to shoot
* Auto - Download/Upload Highscore
* Main menu
* Customizable
* Weather Effects


Improvements
* Better control
* New animated background sprites
* Smaller file size
* Faster Loading
* Improved loading image
* Modified Re-Mix
* Longer View

Customizability
* Change the Background
* Change the Music
* Change the Scoreboard

How to Play

Left - Move left
Right - Move right
Space - Shoot (Only against birds, also reduces the 'Bonus' addition)

Collect Points to raise your score. Collect all 4 gems to receive a 'Gem Bonus'. Collect lives to protect you against the spike hazzards. Avoid touching the birds as they will reduce your 'Bonus' score significantly!

If you have 0 lives and land on a spike the game will end. If you finish the level with remaining lives they will multiply your score ('Life Bonus')!

High Score Updates may take from a few hours up to a few days.
Any spaces found in names are automatically shortened during the processing.

Please report bugs, glitches or errors. Thanks.


A Tutorial on how to be as good as 'Alex' - By Alex.

Step 1: No matter how hard it may be, collect ALL the lives and avoid loosing them by touching the spikes! Lives MULTIPLY YOUR SCORE! (e.g. 1 life will double your total score, 2 will tripple etc.)

Step 2: Get all 4 gems! doing this will get you 50,000 pts! However, if you miss one, then don't bother wasting your time and focus on somthing else. Less than 4 gems = 0 points!

Step 3: Get as many points as you possible can. Especially Icecreams. If there are no icecreams go for the doughnut. If theres no doughnuts go for the gumball, ignore the rest.

Step 4: What ever you do, do NOT let the birds touch you! You have a Bonus Score which counts up in the top right. If you touch a bird your bonus will be lowered (ALOT), also, the acceleration speed of the bonus score will be reset. Use your gun to blow those birds out the way and get the hell out of there! But beware, only use your gun if absolutely necessary, as every shot resets the acceleration of your bonus!

Step 5: If you did all the following correctly you'll be looking at somthing like this:

Points: 150,000
Bonus Score: 50,000
Gem Bonus: 50,000

Subtotal: 250,000

Total: (Subtotal x 3Lives) + Subtotal
Total: 1,000,000

---------
[img]http://img250.echo.cx/img250/9885/comicstrip9vf.gif[/img]

title: Re: Keen Decline v12 (ONLINE HIGHSCORE BOARD)
content:
It is fun, although it takes up all your concentration to get a decent score: trying to shoot the birds, avoid the traps, get points and watch out for bonuses consumes all your attention pretty fast.

However, I still think there should be difficulty settings, with the current being "easy" in downwards speed and "medium" in side-to-side speed. (The harder downwards speed would be faster, whereas the harder side-to-side would be slower) This would have an appropriately large point multiplier, of course.[url=http://www.toxicsheep.com]www.toxicsheep.com[/url]
[url=http://www.last.fm/user/grafix5000/][img]http://www.toxicsheep.com/sigs/scrobblersig.php[/img][/url]

title: Re: Keen Decline v12 (ONLINE HIGHSCORE BOARD)
content:
yeah well, it wouldnt really be fair if some people cause change difficulty and still have their high score online :P

Anyway im glad you enjoyed it. And yes, the highscores are done manually via a program i made which sorts them into the order they are in.---------
[img]http://img250.echo.cx/img250/9885/comicstrip9vf.gif[/img]

title: Re: Keen Decline v12 (ONLINE HIGHSCORE BOARD)
content: Excellent game! Fun game play, great graphics (especially thoseweather effects), good challenge, badass Keen remix (i know you didnt make it but it's still great), and an online highscore list! Lots of fun.  In my opinion a real success. A great and fun Keen Mini Game![img]http://www.denness.net/rpi/username/mr12000[/img]

title: Re: Keen Decline v12 (ONLINE HIGHSCORE BOARD)
content:
Hey, this is pretty cool. Managed to come in 2nd place.

The remix you used, I think, is very well suited to the game. I like the weather effects, too. The music, weather effects and (for lack of a better word) smoothness of the game give it an atmostphere which I quite enjoy. Well done on this game, Alex.--------------

title: Re: nice
content:
So far this looks like a pretty fun game.
It's not properly playable for me on my dual screen setup though. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]
It automatically turns fullscreen, well, there's a lot of black around the actual game with my resolution, so fullscreen isn't the right word, but I'm talking about the big seam smack dab in the middle of course.

Could you make a windowed mode possible, that would be the quickest way of solving this for people like me.Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]
